brief_title: Study to Evaluate Frozen Versus Refrigerated MMRV (Combined Measles, Mumps, Rubella, and Varicella) Investigational Vaccine (V221-016)
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate that an investigational refrigerated vaccine with measles, mumps, rubella, and varicella is well tolerated and has similar immune response when compared to a frozen vaccine with measles, mumps, rubella, and varicella.
intervention_name: V221, measles, mumps, rubella and varicella (Oka/Merck) virus vaccine live / Duration of Treatment: 12 weeks
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Healthy children 12-23 months of age Exclusion Criteria: - Previously had measles, mumps, rubella, or varicella - Compromised immune system
